comments:
I have a GTK colorscheme with a non unicolored widget background (like aqua on macos). When opening the task list I'll get the following exception. Also changing the colors in eclipse preferences does not work, since the exceptions cause the dialog do stay invisible.

I fixed this to handle failures gracefully and revert to the parent widget's color if the calculation goes out of bounds.  However, when you next update (e.g. tomorrow's dev buld or next Monday's RC1) please let me know what message you get in the log so that I can figure out the right calculation for this scenario.
I cannot reproduce this anymore with eclipse 3.3. There is no trace in the logs...
Yup, this should be fixed now, thanks for following up.
